recipe.title: Balchao Masala
ingredients: 1/2 cup cider vinegar or malt vinegar
1 cup dried red Thai or cayenne chiles, stems removed
2 lengthwise slices fresh ginger (each 2 1/2 inches long, 1 inch wide, and 1/8 inch thick)
2 cinnamon sticks (each 3 inches long), broken into smaller pieces
instructions: Pour the vinegar into a blender jar, and then add all the remaining ingredients. Puree, scraping the inside of the jar as needed, until it forms a highly pungent, reddish-brown paste. Store the mixture in a tightly sealed nonreactive container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks, or in the freezer for up to 2 months.
